comments.author: tlong@mozilla.com
comments.text: Just saw a new Xcode release of v11.5, which means we will need to update our CI build tool version and cut a release to be ready for when other iOS apps update their version of Xcode.  It usually takes CircleCI a couple of days to make the new version available after a new version is released.
comments.creator: tlong@mozilla.com
